job_title: Partient Access Specialist in Andover, OH
pros: Great leadership, great coworkers, and great training.
cons: There are no complaints about this employer.

review_title: Not real police work. Glorified security.
pros: Good group of officers with the exception of one who was caught lying to everyone.
cons: Constantly lied to from supervisors. Empty promises of what is to come. Job description is not what the job really is. You are constantly called security by staff. No patrol cruiser. No charges. Very hard for officers todo there job.

job_title: EVS Tech in Geauga Lake, OH
pros: Being part of a team caring for the health of others
cons: Can get overwhelming and very stressful. Being treated poorly by others based on job title

pros: I love working here. Feel very supported in my role and allowed autonomy in my day to day activities. Staff is friendly and well engaged from the top to the bottom.

review_title: PAS at UH Geauga Medical Center
job_title: Patient Access Representative II in Chardon, OH
pros: Great work environment. Friendly staff. Good parking arrangement.
cons: Schedules change constantly. No immediate freeway access to the facility.
